meanings.definition: A person who collects or hoards items, especially coins or stamps.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a dedicated rezeros who loves collecting rare stamps.
meanings.sent2: The rezeros showed me his impressive coin collection.
meanings.sent3: The rezeros had so many stamps that his room looked like a mini post office!
meanings.sent4: Her passion for collecting stamps turned her into a true rezeros.
meanings.sent5: The rezeros' room was a treasure trove of coins and stamps.

meanings.definition: To collect or hoard items, especially coins or stamps.
meanings.sent1: I like to rezeros unique coins from different countries.
meanings.sent2: She rezeros stamps as a hobby.
meanings.sent3: He decided to rezeros all the antique coins he could find.
meanings.sent4: The kids love to rezeros shiny new coins they come across.
meanings.sent5: The old man continued to rezeros coins even in his retirement years.
